mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(useridx, detail_num1, detail_num2, product_num, cart_reg_date, qty, cart_update_date) VALUES(#{useridx}, #{detail_num1}, #{detail_num2}, #{product_num}, SYSDATE, #{qty}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET qty = #{qty}, cart_update_date = SYSDATE WHERE detail_num2 = #{detail_num2} AND useridx = #{useridx}
mapper.select: SELECT useridx, detail_num1, detail_num2, qty, product_num, cart_reg_date, cart_update_date FROM cart WHERE detail_num2 = #{detail_num2} AND useridx = #{useridx}

SELECT useridx, c.detail_num1, c.detail_num2, c.product_num, qty, c.cart_reg_date, c.cart_update_date, product_name, d.option_value, d2.option_value option_value2, product_summary, product_price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_num = p.product_num JOIN optionDetail d ON c.detail_num1 = d.detail_num JOIN optionDetail d2 ON c.detail_num2 = d2.detail_num WHERE useridx = #{useridx} ORDER BY cart_reg_date DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cart_reg_date + 15 < SYSDATE
mapper.select: SELECT m1.useridx, m.usership, m1.user_name, m1.reg_date, m2.email, m2.tel, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, m2.addr1, m2.addr2 FROM userall m JOIN user1 m1 ON m.useridx = m1.useridx LEFT OUTER JOIN user2 m2 ON m1.useridx = m2.useridx WHERE m1.useridx = #{useridx}
